Not sure if this has been talked about before, but who else here is excited for it, but also seriously let down at the same time?

I think Valve had to have broke some type of record with HL3. Rumors go around all the time with out them having to lift a finger.

No one knows is it's even being worked on, yet nearly everyone is sure it is, but then they second guess themselves just because it has been so long since episode 2.

Who here is also a Half-Life fan like myself? Also what are your thoughts on HL3?

Do you hate that Valve has not said anything on it? Do you simply not care anymore? Or ... are you like me and cracking up in side because it's jsut so funny that Valve is probably one of the largest trolls in history to their fans?

They said they didn't want to hype Half-life 3, yet it's even more hyped then if they would have actually announced something XD. Some people think that HL3 is so hyped now, that Valve is too scared to release anything due to expectations.

Even if Valve never releases HL3, it's the only game that has ever hyped me to the point that has made me have the feeling of being unsure weather to be excited or let down at the same time, and it never ends, because you never know o.o. It's like the cake is a lie but you are constantly told it's there for sure, and you believe it, just because it is hard to believe that it isn't actually there.

Half-Life 3 is a strange thing for me. I am used to waiting years for game and have games I love get shut done because A. The company is bought out. Or B. The company goes bankrupt, both of which won't happen to value any time in the foreseeable future. Therefore (in my mind) Half-Life 3 is being made and they know not talking about it will hype it up. Or two it's not being made and they just don't want to admit it. I do truely hope it's the first one, the wait is slowy killing me.

Yeah, I have nfi WHAT the deal is with HL3... I've been waiting since 2007 for something, anything to tide me over. Any tidbit of news, any rumor, anything. It's frustrating when they released two left 4 dead games in that time frame but won't even tell us who have bought four games so far (five counting half-life source) that we will even be GETTING a fifth one, let alone when. (I will concede however, that Portal 2 was awesome and totally made up for the silence... somewhat)

My theories: Either

1) The project is dead. Deader than dead. Dead deadness on a dead guy dead, and nobody has told us yet. Or

2) The project has gone Duke Nukem Forever on us and is bouncing around from engine to engine, team to team, or concept to concept and will come to us a decade from now in a garbled up mess. Or

(and I am hopefully optimistic that this is the likeliest option, given Valve's reputation)

3) They've been working on the project full force since Ep. 2 released and they'll surprise us any day now with a fully formed sequel to end all sequels.

If it's option 3, maybe the radio silence is punishment for all the times the fanbase demanded release dates and information when Valve wasn't ready to deliver.

Maybe we brought this on ourselves... D:
